LABEL: Undead decay
TEXT: At the start of your turn, your undead decay.
You lose one third (rounded up) of your zombies and skeletons each turn. This means the first skeleton only lasts for 1 turn, but the third lasts for 3 turns.

LABEL: Skeleton attacks
TEXT: Your skeletons attack random enemies at the end of your turn.
The damage of skeletons is increased by half your #yStrength (rounded down).

LABEL: Zombie block
TEXT: If you haven't fully blocked an attack, some of your zombies will take the hit for you. If a zombie blocks for more than enough, you even get the leftover block.
The block of zombies is increased by half your #yDexterity (rounded down).

LABEL: Wraiths
TEXT: If you would take more than 1 damage from an attack, one of your wraiths will sacrifice itself to grant you intangibility.
At the beginning of your turn, wraiths dissipate, dealing damage to all enemies.
